mapper.select: SELECT d.drive_name,u.u_name,d.drive_id,d.d_id FROM [drive] d JOIN [users] u ON d.id=u.id AND u.d_id=#{d_id}
SELECT folder_id,folder_name,drive_id,parent_id FROM folder WHERE drive_id=#{dr_id}
SELECT sfolder_id, sfolder_name,drive_id,sfolder_pw FROM share_folder WHERE drive_id=#{dr_id}
SELECT folder_id, folder_name,drive_id,parent_id FROM folder WHERE parent_id=#{pr_id}
SELECT files_id, files_name, files_size,files_date,folder_id FROM files WHERE folder_id=#{folder_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [folder] (folder_name, drive_id, parent_id) VALUES (#{folder_name},#{drive_id}, null)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT files_name,files_size,files_date, CASE #{order} WHEN 0 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY files_name asc) WHEN 1 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY files_name desc) WHEN 2 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY files_date asc) WHEN 3 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY files_date desc) END 행번호 FROM [files] WHERE (#{srchType}=0)OR (#{srchType}=1 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText},files_id)>0)OR (#{srchType}=2 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText},files_name)>0)OR (#{srchType}=3 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText},files_body)>0) )subquery WHERE 행번호 > (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize} AND 행번호 <= #{currentPage} * #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT folder_id,folder_name, CASE #{order} WHEN 0 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY folder_id asc) WHEN 1 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY folder_id desc) WHEN 2 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY folder_name asc) WHEN 3 THEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY folder_name desc) END 행번호 FROM [folder] WHERE (#{srchType}=0)OR (#{srchType}=1 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText},folder_id)>0)OR (#{srchType}=2 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText},folder_name)>0) )subquery WHERE 행번호 > (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize} AND 행번호 <= #{currentPage} * #{pageSize}
